old_headline: Do You Need a MOTAC License for Airbnb in Malaysia? The Real Answer
new_headline: MOTAC License for Airbnb Malaysia 2026: Is it Mandatory?
hypothesis: Page has 25 impressions (top opportunity) but low CTR. 1) '2026' in headline targets fresh intent. 2) Adding TL;DR box and FAQ section at top addresses 'Build In Public' finding that users want immediate answers. 3) FAQ structure targets 'is it mandatory' long-tail queries. 4) Title matches search intent better than 'The Real Answer'.
notes: SEO Brain Experiment Runner - iHousing rotation. Updated 2026-02-16 with latest 2026 freshness, TOUREX compliance details, and FAQ schema.

old_headline: Guest Screening Process: How iHousing Protects Your Property from Bad Guests
new_headline: What Are the Guest Screening and Selection Processes for Airbnb Property Management?
hypothesis: Query asks 'WHAT ARE the processes' - very procedural, informational tone. Current headline focused on 'How iHousing Protects' (company-centric). New headline directly mirrors query language (what are + processes + selection + airbnb property management) to match search intent. Should improve CTR and ranking.
notes: SEO Loop - iHousing (2:30 AM). Changed title + H1 to directly answer the query's exact phrasing. Position 83 suggests weak content match despite comprehensive guide existing in content folder.
